'''Time Capsule Add-On''' is an [[add-on]] made to promote a time capsule made as part of the [[15 Days of Minecraft]] event.

== Additions ==

=== Items ===

* [[File:Time Capsule Handbook.gif|class=pixel-image|width=32x32]] Time Capsule Handbook
** A readable menu split between a tutorial, other maps by Oreville Studios, and support.
** Recommends the Oreville projects [https://guides.orevillestudios.com/actions-and-stuff Actions & Stuff], [https://guides.orevillestudios.com/realistic-biomes Realistic Biomes], [https://guides.orevillestudios.com/world-builder World Builder], and [https://guides.orevillestudios.com/health-bars Health Bars].
{{crafting|Paper|Paper|Paper|Chest
|Output = 
|type = Miscellaneous
|ignoreusage=1
}}
* [[File:Time Capsule Spawner.png|class=pixel-image|width=32x32]] Time Capsule Spawner
** Places the entity, triggering an animation of two random characters emerging from the ground, building the time capsule, and then leaving.
** Characters include [[Ari]], [[Alex]], [[Efe]], [[Makena]], [[Noor]], [[Steve]], [[Sunny]], and [[Zuri]].{{Needs testing}}<!-- From my testing Kai hasn't shown up, but could very well still be there. -->
{{crafting|Iron Ingot|Clock|Chest|Chest
|Output = 
|type = Miscellaneous
|ignoreusage=1
}}

=== Blocks ===
* [[File:Cherry Trapdoor Time Capsule Add-On.png|class=pixel-image|width=32x32]] Cherry Trapdoor
** Nonfunctional, full block version of a [[cherry trapdoor]].
** Used as part of the construction of the time capsule.

* [[File:Hopper Time Capsule Add-On.png|class=pixel-image|width=32x32]] Hopper
** Nonfunctional, full block version of a [[hopper]].
** Used as part of the construction of the time capsule.

* [[File:Ladder Time Capsule Add-On.png|class=pixel-image|width=32x32]] Ladder
** Nonfunctional, full block version of a [[ladder]].
** Used as part of the construction of the time capsule, allowing for the illusion of the two heroes emerging from the ground; it's merely a single block that looks like a dirt chute.
=== Entities ===
* [[File:Time Capsule render.png|class=pixel-image|width=32x32]] Time Capsule
** Used to contain various items for certain amounts of time. This can be determined by the second, minute, hour, day, month, or year, between both real time and [[Minecraft Time]].
** The capsule's coordinates can be hidden, whispered, and announced.{{More info}}
** Consists of [[grass blocks]], [[pink petals]], [[stone brick stairs]], a [[cherry]] [[tree]], cherry trapdoor, hopper [[trapped chest]], and ladder. Attempting to {{Control|break}} any piece of this will trigger a pop-up asking if the player wishes to remove the structure<ref group="note" name="destruction">It is possible to burn the tree or to delete blocks of it by opening an [[End portal]]. The grass blocks can be turned into [[farmland]]s or [[dirt path]]s.</ref>, however these can still be {{Control|picking block}} in [[Creative]].
** Upon the time limit being met, an animation of fireworks going off will play, with the item being given [[lore]] that displays the time spent in the capsule.{{More info}}
